rooms.description: An open and inviting entrance hall that leads into the living room and home office.
spacious art deco styled living room with vintage accents, featuring a modernized home theater system integrated into the design.
A semi-open dining area adjacent to the living room, following Vastu principles with optimal sunlight.
A dedicated home office space designed for productivity and privacy, with built-in storage and art deco detailing.
A compact yet functional kitchen designed in art deco style with modern appliances, following Vastu guidelines for optimal energy flow.
A well-appointed master bedroom with ample storage and art deco touches, oriented to face the sunrise.
An efficiently designed bathroom near the master bedroom, featuring a vanity and art deco inspired fixtures.
A multi-functional storage and utility space that can double as a laundry area or guest closet.

openings.description: A grand entrance door with art deco elements, positioned on the east side to greet the morning sun as per Vastu.
Large windows in the living room ensuring ample natural light and ventilation, placed on the north and south walls for balance.
Windows designed to let in soft, diffused light during work hours while offering privacy.

features.description: Integrated home theater system with surround sound and acoustically treated walls in the living room.
A dedicated, well-lit, and quiet workspace designed for professional use.

vastu_details.description: Rooms are arranged to maximize natural light and positive energy flow, with master bedroom facing east.
